description: The llama… in t-shirt form. What could be better? Maybe the fact that this super soft tee is also made from organic cotton and recycled polyester in a Fair Trade Certified™ factory. When you throw on the Topo Llama, you’re supporting higher standards that contribute both to the preservation of our planet and to the livelihood of factory workers.
name: Cotopaxi Topo Llama Organic T-Shirt - Mens
